versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Assembles comprehensive goal plans from components

schema.prompt:
Assemble a comprehensive goal achievement plan from the following components:

SMART Goal: {{input.smartGoal}}
Milestones: {{input.milestones}}
Action Plans: {{input.actionPlans}}
Tracking System: {{input.trackingSystem}}
Motivation Strategy: {{input.motivationStrategy}}

Create an integrated plan that includes:

1. Executive Summary:
   - Goal statement and vision
   - Key success metrics
   - Timeline overview
   - Critical success factors

2. Master Timeline:
   - Phase breakdown
   - Milestone schedule with dependencies
   - Action item calendar
   - Review and adjustment points
   - Buffer time allocation

3. Implementation Roadmap:
   - Week 1-2: Launch phase
   - Month 1: Foundation building
   - Ongoing: Execution rhythm
   - Final phase: Completion and celebration

4. Resource Dashboard:
   - Time requirements summary
   - Budget/cost overview
   - Tool and material list
   - Support network mapping
   - Learning resources

5. Success Framework:
   - Daily success habits
   - Weekly review protocol
   - Monthly milestone checks
   - Adjustment triggers
   - Celebration plan

6. Risk Management:
   - Identified risks and mitigation
   - Early warning indicators
   - Pivot strategies
   - Recovery protocols

7. Quick Reference Guide:
   - One-page summary
   - Key metrics dashboard
   - Daily/weekly checklist
   - Emergency motivation kit
   - Contact/resource list

Structure for clarity and actionability with visual organization suggestions.

Return as structured JSON with keys: executiveSummary (object), masterTimeline (object), implementationRoadmap (object), resourceDashboard (object), successFramework (object), riskManagement (array), quickReference (object), launchChecklist (array).

props.placeholder: Detailed action steps for each milestone...

translations.description: Assembles comprehensive goal achievement plans from individual components
translations.instructions: Enter all components of your goal plan. The system will assemble them into a comprehensive, actionable plan with timeline, resources, and success framework.
translations.name: Plan Assembler
